content:
501 WATCH VIDEO - "This is Dearborn, Michigan. Nearly all of the people in this video have visas or legalized citizenship." posted 1 hour ago by bleeje 89 comments award share report block End Wokeness @EndWokeness • 4h This is Dearborn, Michigan. Nearly all of the people in this video have visas or legalized citizenship.
